withProbability(double) - Method in class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom
The purpose of this method is so that entropy-counting subclasses can detect that no more than 1 bit of entropy is actually being consumed, even though this method uses BaseRandom.nextDouble() which normally consumes 53 bits.

withProbabilityInternal(double) - Method in class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom
Called by BaseRandom.withProbability(double) to generate a boolean with a specified probability of returning true, after special cases (probability 0 or less, or 1 or more) have been eliminated.
